si-addon-preload: A placeholder for when the web query for the total number of files available is running.
si-overlay-coreContent-left-title: Title of the section displaying the video.
si-overlay-coreContent-left-novideo: Placeholder paragraph when no video available, encouragin user to contribute a video.
si-overlay-coreContent-left-contribute-l: One liner to direct user to Sign Language video recorder on LinguaLibre
si-overlay-coreContent-right-title: Title of the section displaying Wiktionary's definitions.
si-overlay-coreContent-right-wikt-iso: Default Wiktionary to use on installation, its language wiki code.
si-overlay-coreContent-right-wikt-sectio: Within the target wiktionary, the html id anchor of the relevant section.
si-popup-browse-title: Title of the search / browse tab.
si-popup-browse-placeholder: Announce the number of available videos.
si-popup-history-title: Thitle of the history / search logs' tab.
si-popup-history-noHistory: Placeholder when no log is available.
si-popup-settings-signlanguage: Setting title for the sign language selection among sign languages available.
si-popup-settings-signlanguage-help: Hint on the change sign language selector.
si-popup-settings-history: Setting title to change history's length.
si-popup-settings-history-help: Hint on how to desactivate history logs
si-popup-settings-wpintegration: Setting title for sign language video integration into Wikip|media websites.
si-popup-settings-twospeed: Setting title for video's double play at different speed.
si-popup-settings-enlighten: Setting title to enlighten available words.
si-videosGallery-video: Video attibution at bottom of video gallery, with Commons URL, speaker, and position of the video within the gallery
